job description:
Job Description
Bring your analytical expertise to our fast-growing company. GrillGrate is an on-line sensation that needs a digital pro to take us to the next level in content, advertising, and customer engagement.

GrillGrate is a patented cooking surface for any grill. We manufacture GrillGrate in the USA. We sell on line and through a network of independent retailers. 75% of our marketing is digital / online. If you like to grill or are a foodie that is a big plus.

Skills Required:

· Mastery of Excel

· Google analytics and ROI analysis

· CRM expertise, email workflows and list building

Additional Skills

· Amazon back-end experience

· Digital advertising and content creation

· Website publishing

· Customer service

The ideal candidate is a college grad and with proven data expertise. Social media and customer engagement skills a plus. Bonus can be 15-20% of salary. We are bonus driven based on performance of the company and the individual.
Company Description
We manufacture the award winning GrillGrate- an improved grill surface for any grill. Google us and see what our customers are saying. You'll see why we are growing! Our office in Cartersville is a busy place with a dedicated crew. We sell GrillGrate on-line, and in retail stores around the US, Canada, UK, Europe and Australia. Grillers world wide know GrillGrates grill food better! A bonus structure is a big piece of compensation for us. Based on company performance and individual contribution bonuses can be up to 25% of salary.
